footer-text-p1: Designed in Adobe XD. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
greeting:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my portfolio.

I am a front-end developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. 

I have a diverse educational background, including a degree in art and design education and formal training in front-end development. This blend of creativity and technical skills enables me to develop user-centered applications with a strong focus on both functionality and aesthetics.

I am always eager to learn and grow, whether by exploring backend technologies like SQL and NoSQL, improving performance optimization, or experimenting with new frameworks and tools. My goal is to build scalable, maintainable, and efficient web applications that provide great experiences for users.

In my free time, I enjoy exploring creative coding, UI/UX design, and prototyping, as well as spending time outdoors, crocheting amigurumis, and I love to cook.
noroff: Vocational school education in front-end development at Noroff
oslomet: Bachelors degree in Art, Design and Crafts Teacher at OsloMet

artfulBids.description: This project was to create an auction website, where users can add items to be bid on and bid on items other users have put up for auction. The backend is from Noroff API.

holidaze.description: My final exam was to create an accommodation booking site, with both a customer and an admin-facing side. I chose to learn Next.js and used the App Router. The backend is from Noroff API.

omniThings.description: In this project I used React to create an eCom store, where I got to know Redux a bit. The backend is from Noroff API.

popTheBubble.description: Pop The Bubble is a browser-based game built with TypeScript, where the player must pop as many bubbles as possible before time runs out. The game features different difficulty levels, dynamic animations, and simple yet challenging mechanics.

skills-set: Curious, Creative, Quick Learner, Eye for Design, Team Player, Passionate, Adaptable, User-Focused
uia: Annual Study in Communication at UiA
